Module clientCLI
Package com.etiennecollin.ift2255.clientCLI.models.data.products

Class Product

java.lang.Object
com.etiennecollin.ift2255.clientCLI.models.data.DatabaseObject
com.etiennecollin.ift2255.clientCLI.models.data.products.Product
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
BookOrManual, IT, LearningResource, OfficeEquipment, StationeryArticle
public abstract class Product extends DatabaseObject
An abstract class representing a product in the system.
See Also:
